theme.name: Social
theme.bodyScript:
#set ($minWidthUnit = $core_v2_theme.GetUnitValue('minWidth', '670px', 10)) #set ($minWidth = $core_v2_utility.ParseInt($core_v2_utility.Replace($minWidthUnit, 'px', '')))
#set ($wrappingFormats = []) #set ($ignore = $wrappingFormats.Add("%{Name=$core_v2_language.GetResource('WrappingFormat-NoBorderWithNoSpacing'),CssClass='no-wrapper',IncludeHeader='false'}")) #set ($ignore = $wrappingFormats.Add("%{Name=$core_v2_language.GetResource('WrappingFormat-NoBorderWithSpacing'),CssClass='no-wrapper with-spacing',IncludeHeader='false'}")) #set ($ignore = $wrappingFormats.Add("%{Name=$core_v2_language.GetResource('WrappingFormat-NoBorderWithSpacingAndHeader'),CssClass='no-wrapping with-spacing with-header',IncludeHeader='true'}")) #set ($ignore = $wrappingFormats.Add("%{Name=$core_v2_language.GetResource('WrappingFormat-TopBorder'),CssClass='top-border with-spacing',IncludeHeader='false'}")) #set ($ignore = $wrappingFormats.Add("%{Name=$core_v2_language.GetResource('WrappingFormat-TopBorderAndHeader'),CssClass='top-border with-spacing with-header',IncludeHeader='true'}")) #set ($options = "%{ WrappingFormats = $wrappingFormats, DefaultWrappingFormatWithHeader = 'top-border with-spacing with-header reponsive-1', DefaultWrappingFormatWithoutHeader = 'no-wrapper responsive-1', LayoutReflowMinWidth = $minWidth }")
$context_v2_themeBody.RenderHeader($options) $context_v2_themeBody.RenderPage($options) $context_v2_themeBody.RenderFooter($options)
theme.configuration: <propertyGroup id="fontsAndColors" labelResourceName="fontsAndColors" visible="true"> <propertySubGroup id="fontsAndColorsGeneral" labelResourceName="colors" visible="true"> <property id="colorLabel" descriptionResourceName="fontsAndColorsDesc" dataType="String" editable="false" visible="true" /> <property id="bannerColorLabel" labelResourceName="banners" descriptionResourceName="bannersDesc" dataType="String" editable="false" visible="true" /> <property id="backgroundColor" labelResourceName="background" defaultValue="#FFFFFF" dataType="Color" /> <property id="foregroundColor" labelResourceName="foreground" defaultValue="#22252C" dataType="Color" /> <property id="accentColor" labelResourceName="accent" descriptionResourceName="accentDesc" defaultValue="#006FFF" dataType="Color" /> <property id="linkFontColor" labelResourceName="link" descriptionResourceName="linkDesc" defaultValue="#006FFF" dataType="Color" /> <property id="contrast" labelResourceName="contrast" descriptionResourceName="contrastDesc" defaultValue="0" dataType="Double" inputType="range" min="-1" max="1" step=".1" rangeTicks="5" rangeLabel="true" rangeLabelFormat="Percent" /> </propertySubGroup> <propertySubGroup id="fontsAndColorsBaseFont" labelResourceName="fonts" visible="true"> <property id="fontsAndColorsBaseFontLabel" descriptionResourceName="fontsDesc" dataType="String" editable="false" visible="true" /> <property id="baseFont" labelResourceName="font" defaultValue="system" dataType="String"> <propertyValue value="system" labelResourceName="system" propertiesToHide="baseFontCustom" /> <propertyValue value="helvetica" labelResourceName="helvetica" propertiesToHide="baseFontCustom" /> <propertyValue value="source-sans-pro" labelResourceName="sourceSansPro" propertiesToHide="baseFontCustom" /> <propertyValue value="open-sans" labelResourceName="spenSans" propertiesToHide="baseFontCustom" /> <propertyValue value="fira-sans" labelResourceName="firaSans" propertiesToHide="baseFontCustom" /> <propertyValue value="custom" labelResourceName="customFont" propertiesToShow="baseFontCustom" /> </property> <property id="baseFontCustom" labelResourceName="custom" descriptionResourceName="customFontDesc" dataType="Url" allowedFileExtensions="woff" allowLocal="true" enablePreview="true" /> <property id="baseFontSizeValue" labelResourceName="size" defaultValue="14px" dataType="Unit" /> <property id="baseFontWeight" labelResourceName="weight" defaultValue="400" dataType="Int"> <propertyValue value="100" labelText="100" /> <propertyValue value="200" labelText="200" /> <propertyValue value="300" labelText="300" /> <propertyValue value="400" labelText="400" /> <propertyValue value="500" labelText="500" /> <propertyValue value="600" labelText="600" /> <propertyValue value="700" labelText="700" /> <propertyValue value="800" labelText="800" /> <propertyValue value="900" labelText="900" /> </property> <property id="baseFontStyle" labelResourceName="style" defaultValue="normal" dataType="String"> <propertyValue value="normal" labelResourceName="normal" /> <propertyValue value="italic" labelResourceName="italic" /> </property> <property id="baseFontLineHeight" labelResourceName="lineHeight" defaultValue="1.5em" dataType="Unit" /> </propertySubGroup> <propertySubGroup id="fontsAndColorsStateColors" labelResourceName="specialtyColors" visible="true"> <property id="fontsAndColorsStateColorsLabel" descriptionResourceName="specialtyColorsDesc" dataType="String" editable="false" visible="true" /> <property id="statePositive" labelResourceName="positive" descriptionResourceName="positiveDesc" defaultValue="#00CE7E" dataType="Color" /> <property id="statePending" labelResourceName="pending" descriptionResourceName="pendingDesc" defaultValue="#FF8C00" dataType="Color" /> <property id="stateAttention" labelResourceName="attention" descriptionResourceName="attentionDesc" defaultValue="#FF8C00" dataType="Color" /> <property id="stateNegative" labelResourceName="negative" descriptionResourceName="negativeDesc" defaultValue="#E53935" dataType="Color" /> </propertySubGroup> </propertyGroup> <propertyGroup id="logo" labelResourceName="logo" visible="true"> <property id="siteLogoLabel" labelResourceName="siteLogo" descriptionResourceName="siteLogoDesc" dataType="String" editable="false" visible="true" /> <property id="favicon" labelResourceName="favicon" descriptionResourceName="faviconDesc" dataType="Url" enablePreview="true" allowLocal="true" allowRemote="false" /> </propertyGroup> <propertyGroup id="dimensions" labelResourceName="dimensions" visible="true"> <property id="layoutsLabel" labelResourceName="layouts" descriptionResourceName="layoutsDesc" dataType="String" editable="false" visible="true" /> <property id="minWidth" labelResourceName="minimumWidth" descriptionResourceName="minimumWidthDesc" defaultValue="670px" dataType="Unit" /> <property id="maxWidth" labelResourceName="maximumWidth" descriptionResourceName="maximumWidthDesc" defaultValue="1060px" dataType="Unit" /> <property id="siteHeader" labelResourceName="siteHeaderBehavior" descriptionResourceName="siteHeaderBehaviorDesc" defaultValue="adaptive" dataType="String"> <propertyValue value="adaptive" labelResourceName="siteHeaderAdaptiveDesc" /> <propertyValue value="static" labelResourceName="siteHeaderStaticDesc" /> </property> <property id="sidebar" labelResourceName="sidebarBehavior" descriptionResourceName="sidebarBehaviorDesc" defaultValue="adaptive" dataType="String"> <propertyValue value="adaptive" labelResourceName="sidebarBehaviorAdaptive" /> <propertyValue value="static" labelResourceName="sidebarBehaviorStatic" /> </property> </propertyGroup>

theme.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="accent">Accent</resource> <resource name="accentDesc">Used for buttons, borders, and some links</resource> <resource name="attention">Attention State</resource> <resource name="attentionDesc">Used when indicating both warning states as well as toggled active button states.</resource> <resource name="background">Background</resource> <resource name="banners">Banners</resource> <resource name="bannersDesc">Site, group, and blog banner color palettes can be selected directly within the configuration of those widgets.</resource> <resource name="colors">Colors</resource> <resource name="contrast">Contrast adjustment</resource> <resource name="contrastDesc">Contrast adjustments influence generated colors.</resource> <resource name="custom">Custom</resource> <resource name="customFont">Custom Font</resource> <resource name="customFontDesc">Web Open Font Format (WOFF) File</resource> <resource name="dimensions">Layout</resource> <resource name="favicon">Favicon</resource> <resource name="faviconDesc">The favicon displays on browser tabs and home screens. PNG format and high resolution (256x256) are recommended.</resource> <resource name="firaSans">Fira Sans</resource> <resource name="font">Font</resource> <resource name="fonts">Fonts</resource> <resource name="fontsAndColors">Fonts and Colors</resource> <resource name="fontsAndColorsDesc">These colors represent a baseline and will be slightly adjusted by the theme as necessary.</resource> <resource name="fontsDesc">These font settings represent a baseline and will be adjusted by the theme as necessary.</resource> <resource name="foreground">Foreground</resource> <resource name="helvetica">Helvetica, Arial</resource> <resource name="italic">Italic</resource> <resource name="layouts">Page Layouts</resource> <resource name="layoutsDesc">Page, header, and footer layouts can be edited by visiting the page and selecting Manage Theme > Edit this Page.</resource> <resource name="lineHeight">Line Height</resource> <resource name="link">Link</resource> <resource name="linkDesc">Used for most links</resource> <resource name="logo">Logo</resource> <resource name="maximumWidth">Maximum Width</resource> <resource name="maximumWidthDesc">Maximum width, in pixels, beyond which the layout will not expand.</resource> <resource name="minimumWidth">Minimum Width</resource> <resource name="minimumWidthDesc">Minimum width, in pixels, beyond which the layout will transition to a single-column mobile-friendly layout.</resource> <resource name="negative">Negative</resource> <resource name="negativeDesc">Used when indicating problematic states such as rejecting an answer.</resource> <resource name="normal">Normal</resource> <resource name="palette_amber">Amber</resource> <resource name="palette_blue">Blue</resource> <resource name="palette_bluegray">Blue Gray</resource> <resource name="palette_city">City</resource> <resource name="palette_cyan">Cyan</resource> <resource name="palette_dark">Dark</resource> <resource name="palette_dark_blue">Dark Blue</resource> <resource name="palette_dark_gray">Dark Gray</resource> <resource name="palette_green">Green</resource> <resource name="palette_light">Light</resource> <resource name="palette_light_gray">Light Gray</resource> <resource name="palette_lightblue">Light Blue</resource> <resource name="palette_lightbluegray">Light Blue Gray</resource> <resource name="palette_lime">Lime</resource> <resource name="palette_limeade">Limeade</resource> <resource name="palette_moonrise">Moonrise</resource> <resource name="palette_peach">Peach</resource> <resource name="palette_pink">Pink</resource> <resource name="palette_purple">Purple</resource> <resource name="palette_red">Red</resource> <resource name="palette_river">River</resource> <resource name="palette_scooter">Scooter</resource> <resource name="palette_stellar">Stellar</resource> <resource name="palette_sunny">Sunny</resource> <resource name="palette_sunset">Sunset</resource> <resource name="palette_teal">Teal</resource> <resource name="palette_tropic">Tropic</resource> <resource name="palette_type_context">Group and Blog Banners, Navigation, Featured Content</resource> <resource name="palette_type_site">Site Banner</resource> <resource name="palette_white">White</resource> <resource name="palette_yellow">Yellow</resource> <resource name="pending">Pending State</resource> <resource name="pendingDesc">Used when indicating pending states such as suggested answers.</resource> <resource name="positive">Positive State</resource> <resource name="positiveDesc">Used when indicating approved states such as verified answers.</resource> <resource name="sidebarBehavior">Sidebar Behavior</resource> <resource name="sidebarBehaviorAdaptive">Attempt to keep the sidebar visible.</resource> <resource name="sidebarBehaviorDesc">When the page scrolls,</resource> <resource name="sidebarBehaviorStatic">Allow the sidebar to scroll out of view.</resource> <resource name="siteHeaderAdaptiveDesc">Shrink the site header and keep it visible.</resource> <resource name="siteHeaderBehavior">Site Header Behavior</resource> <resource name="siteHeaderBehaviorDesc">When the page scrolls,</resource> <resource name="siteHeaderStaticDesc">Allow the site header to scroll out of view.</resource> <resource
